result.title: Hints for Week 2
result.content:
K-Periodic Array

Greedy

Young Photographer

Greedy

Number of Ways

The sum of the array has to be divisible by 3 i.e. S%3 == 0 and each segment will have the same sum S/3.

If the first segment goes from index 1 to i then and the second segment goes from index i+1 to j then the cumulative sum from 1 to j will 2S/3.

Han Solo and Lazer Gun

Geometry. Think in terms of equations of lines.

Modulo Sum

DP and pigeon hole principle.
